General.Name: KoMiCo Ltd
General.Description: KoMiCo Ltd. provides precision cleaning and special coating services for device industries. The company serves semiconductors, displays, and solar-photovoltaic industries. It has operations primarily in South Korea, the United States, China, Taiwan, and Singapore. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Anseong, South Korea.
